items.name: CM-17 Butcher
items.description: An armor often worn by frontline surgeons, who are skilled at both putting bodies back together and taking them apart.

passive.name: Med-Kit
passive.description:
Increases initial inventory and holding capacity of stims by +2. 
 Increases stim effect duration by 2.0s.

items.name: CE-67 Titan
items.description: A quality product, this armor can destroy over 300,000 kilometers of fencing with no decline in operational efficiency.
